Key Match Events: Anrich Nortje took 4 wickets for 10 runs.
Quinton de Kock scored 63 off 38 balls.
Tabraiz Shamsi took 3 wickets for 20 runs.
Post-Match Reflections: Shakib Al Hasan: 'Our plans were fine but the execution was completely off'
Rilee Rossouw on his dream year: 'Never thought about it in a million years'
Kumble: There was no semblance of a fight from Bangladesh

S Sinha: 'Bavuma did exactly the right thing in giving enough play to the spinners as well in this sort of a game to find the necessary rhythm under the conditions and get cracking for the matches ahead.'
Niamatullah: 'Rilee Rossouw beat Bangladesh by 8 runs.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa will be table toppers at least for a short while due to their huge net run rate.
South Africa might have made up for the washout against Zimbabwe.
